c74object.name: grainflow.util.spatpan~
c74object.digest: An easy way to pan grains generated with grainflow
c74object.description: An easy way to pan grains generated with grainflow.

attribute.name: distanceThreshold
attribute.digest: the maximum distance where a source can be rendered by a speaker
attribute.description: the maximum distance where a source can be rendered by a speaker

attribute.name: exponent
attribute.digest: an exponent determining the falloff curve
attribute.description: an exponent determining the falloff curve. 0 is linear

attribute.name: mode
attribute.digest: Panning algorithm used to determine gains
attribute.description: Panning algorithm used to determine gains. vbap selects the top N speakers and evenly pans between them. dpab also selects the top N speakers, but adjusts volume based on distance

attribute.name: speakersPerSource
attribute.digest: maximum number of speakers that can receive signal from a single source
attribute.description: maximum number of speakers that can receive signal from a single source
